dublinCore.dc:title: HR 5973 ENR: Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Reauthorization Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Seventeenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Monday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty-two
form.official-title: To reauthorize the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Reauthorization Act of 2022.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990

subsection.text: Section 1008 of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941f) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), in the matter preceding paragraph (1)—

subparagraph.text: by inserting and not later than December 31, 2027, after 2021,;
by striking Committee on Resources and inserting Committee on Natural Resources; and
by inserting , with respect to the period covered by the report after describes; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2016 through 2020 and inserting 2023 through 2028.

subsection.text: Section 1009(a) of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941g(a)) is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2016 through 2021 and inserting 2023 through 2028.
Section 1009(a)(1)(B) of the Great Lakes Fish and Wildlife Restoration Act of 1990 (16 U.S.C. 941g(a)(1)(B)) is amended by striking 5 and inserting 3.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
